description: This file defines an Angular component for a dictionary search UI. It manages user input, interacts with a DictionaryService to perform searches, and handles UI state such as loading, errors, and results.

classes.name: DictionaryComponent
classes.description: An Angular UI component that provides a searchable dictionary interface, handling user input, displaying results, and managing UI state.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the component, sets up the RxJS pipeline for search input debouncing and API calls, and ensures cleanup on destroy.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles user input event, updates the query signal, and emits a new search trigger.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Triggers a search based on the current query.

methods.name: trackByIndex
methods.description: Helper method for Angular's ngFor trackBy to optimize rendering of list items by index.
